description: Erection of a single storey motor control center (MCC)
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than three years from the date of this decision.

Condition : 3 - Should the hereby approve building be regularly visited by staff then the applicant shall install gas protection measures into the development in accordance with a minimum of a Characteristic Situation 2 or equivalent specification before the development is first occupied. Photographic evidence of implementation and certification of Building Regulations inspection to demonstrate that the measures have been installed to comply with this specification shall be submitted to the local planning authority in writing for approval before the development is first brought into use.

Condition : 4 - Before the development hereby permitted is first occupied or brought into use, a Biodiversity Enhancement Strategy (BES) shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the approved details. The BES should include:
i.	details of how the enhancement measures proposed in the Preliminary Ecological Appraisal and Protected Species Survey Report  will be implemented, monitored, managed and maintained, including the long- term design objectives, management responsibilities and maintenance schedules
ii.	additional detail on location and type of bird/bat boxes, maintenance and a commitment that any data collected is to be shared with the Council;
iii.	a commitment to undertake habitat monitoring annually by a qualified ecologist.
